questions.question: Which of the following are true about Node.js? (Select all that apply)
correctAns: It is a JavaScript runtime environment
It uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model
It is used for building server-side applications
incorrectAns: It is only compatible with Windows operating systems

questions.question: Which of the following are commonly used tools in frontend development?
Which of the following are true about ReactJS? (Select two)
correctAns: It uses a virtual DOM to improve performance
It is used for building user interfaces
incorrectAns: It is a server-side rendering framework
